channel.title: Filter on Karthikeyan Sundararajan

item.title: aws-cloudwatch-k8s-api-log-filter
item.description: Filter EKS API Server Logs in Cloudwatch Kubernetes Version: 1.25 Cloud Provider: AWS EKS Open Cloudwatch Open Logs Insights Select EKS API Server Log group fields @timestamp, @message, sourceIPs.0 | filter responseObject.metadata.name like /REPLACE_NAMEPSACE_NAME_HERE/ | filter verb like /create/ | filter requestURI like /api\/v1\/namespaces/ | filter responseObject.kind like /Namespace/ | sort @timestamp desc
